name: stopwatch
title: stopwatch
description: Lets you start and stop a timer.
author: ungarmichael

commands.name: startStopwatch
commands.title: Start Stopwatch
commands.subtitle: Starts the Stopwatch.
commands.description: Starts a stopwatch in the background.

commands.name: stopStopwatch
commands.title: Stop Stopwatch
commands.subtitle: Stops the Stopwatch.
commands.description: Stops the stopwatch and copies the time to the clipboard.
